name: Hamas
startIntroPart2: By Allah, we will take what is rightfully ours and protect our people.
declaringWar: By Allah's grace, our lands will be returned to us through blood
attacked: We will defend our people to the end against barbarians like you.
defeated: And so our flaming passion is snuffed out, Allah guide us for what comes next.
introduction: It is a pleasure for our peoples to meet, respect whats ours and Allah will be with you.
hateHello: The end is coming soon, can you feel it?
hateLetsHearIt: Its your meeting, Why dont you start talking?
hateNo: This is an insult to my people!
Thats your version of a good idea?
afterPeace: Allah guides us all, may his wisdom and mercy help both our peoples rebuild.
tradeRequest: From one great leader to another, please accept this offer.
uniques: Rebel units may spawn <[{in enemy cities, Enemy}]> <when at war>
